DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement 
RE: http://www.daiforme.com/ (IP 66.98.250.6) 
  
Dear Everyones Internet, 
  
I, Long Thai, Anti-Piracy Team Member of A.D. Vision, Inc. (ADV), certify 
under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of 
the owner of certain intellectual property rights. 
  
I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not 
authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their 
agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner\'s rights. I request that 
you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items 
claimed to be infringing. 
 
The materials listed below can be obtained through a paid membership 
subscription service being run by daiforme.com. 
  
Allegedly infringing items or materials: 
  
            009-1 
            Air Gear 
            All Purpose Cultural Cat Girl Nuku Nuku 
            Angelic Layer 
            Aquarian Age 
            Arc the Lad 
            Area 88 OVA 
            Area 88 TV 
            Azumanga Daioh 
            Blue Seed 
            Bubblegum Crisis: Tokyo 2040
